summary: Webinar Integration with Content Matrix - All features tested and working correctly. Backend: 11/11 tests passed. Frontend: All UI components verified.
seed_data_creation: Test content items and contacts created during testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Webinar integration features fully tested. All 6 endpoints working: POST /api/events-v2/from-content-item, POST /api/events-v2/{event_id}/import-contacts, GET /api/events-v2/contact/{contact_id}/history, GET /api/events-v2/{event_id}/watching-room, POST /api/events-v2/{event_id}/watch-ping, DELETE /api/content/items/{item_id} (protection). Frontend components verified: Content Matrix webinar creation modal, Events V2 import contacts modal, ContactSheet webinars tab.

backend_endpoints.description: Creates webinar from content item with auto-generated tasks
Imports contacts with stage logic (new→Stage 2, Stage 1→Stage 2, Stages 3-5→no change)
Returns webinar history for a contact
Returns watching room data for enrolled contacts
Tracks watch time for contacts in webinar
Returns 409 Conflict when content item has associated webinar

frontend_components.description: Modal opens from cell items, shows date/time pickers, YouTube Live and LMS auto-enroll options
CSV upload, import type selection, calendar invite option, stage logic explanation displayed
Shows webinar history with status (registered/attended), dates, watch time, thumbnails
